p: The data presented in Figure 5, Figure 6, and Figure 7 show the impact of the concentration of wall material liquid feed solution on the EE of the main active compounds in ethanolic extract and essential oil. The RA EE of spray-dried powders varied from 17.69% ± 0.09% to 93.33% ± 0.62% and was the highest when wall material contained 30% resistant-maltodextrin and the lowest when it contained 10% resistant-maltodextrin ( Figure 4).
